{"id":521890353,"lang":"cpp","time":"11 months, 1 week","timestamp":1626182934,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"32 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/521890353/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"32.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int m=nums.size();\n        vector<int> pre(m+1,0);\n        for(int i=1;i<=m;i++){\n            pre[i]=nums[i-1]+pre[i-1];\n        }\n        pre.emplace_back(0);\n        for(int i=1;i<=m;i++){\n            if(pre[i-1]==pre[m]-pre[i]){\n                return i-1;\n            }\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index"}
